医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
“无烟一代”概念可以节省数十亿美元的医疗费用尽管过去 50 年来吸烟率大幅下降，但吸烟仍然是加拿大疾病、残疾和死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Smoke-free- Generation-concept-could-save-billions-in-health-care-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Smoke-free- Generation-concept-could-save-billions-in-health-care-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec25aa5d-6d38-4b79-84ee-0497649ed6a1 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 11:05:43 -0500 "Smoke-free generation" concept could save billions in health-care costs
研究揭示H5N1禽流感的危险突变德克萨斯州生物医学中心的研究人员发现，从德克萨斯州人类身上分离出的最早的禽流感病毒株显示出一系列独特的突变，与奶牛中发现的病毒株相比，它能够更容易地在人类细胞中复制，并在小鼠中引起更严重的疾病。研究所（德克萨斯州生物医学）关于新兴微生物和感染的报告。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Study-reveals-dangerous-mutations-in-H5N1-bird-flu.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Study-reveals-dangerous-mutations-in-H5N1-bird-flu.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dbd02fc-00b6-4170-8ccd-fd3cb535c2ef Thu, 16 Jan 2025 11:01:19 -0500 Study reveals dangerous mutations in H5N1 bird flu
Monmouth Scientific 模块化洁净室扩建提高了 Womed 的产量Womed 的洁净室扩建由 Monmouth Scientific 设计，通过 ISO 7 合规性和增强的医疗器械制造工作流程优化生产。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Monmouth-Scientific-Modular-Cleanroom-expansion-enhances-product-for-Womed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Monmouth-Scientific-Modular-Cleanroom-expansion-enhances-production-for-Womed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b472bdf2-8fc1-4339-b149-98f431446429 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 09:52:00 -0500 Monmouth Scientific Modular Cleanroom expansion enhances production for Womed
Pittcon 历史性地首次亮相波士顿世界领先的科学中心波士顿 Pittcon 2025：一场将行业和学术界联合起来的里程碑式活动，旨在推动分析化学发展并促进突破性的科学合作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Pittcon-to-make-historic-first-appearance-in-Bostone28099s-world-leading-scientific-hub.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Pittcon-to-make-historic-first-appearance-in-Bostone28099s-world-leading-scientific-hub.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e210bab-3ed5-4c14-8dde-1d358a29c73b Thu, 16 Jan 2025 09:19:00 -0500 Pittcon to make historic first appearance in Boston’s world-leading scientific hub
研究确定了改善神经退行性疾病记忆力的潜在途径Rafael Rodríguez-Puertas 博士领导下的 UPV/EHU 神经化学和神经退行性疾病小组经过 20 多年的研究，发现了开发新疗法的有前景的途径，可改善阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症等神经退行性疾病认知障碍患者的记忆力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Study-identizes-pottial-pathway-to-improve-memory-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Study-identizes-pottial-pathway-to-improve-memory-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba5762ae-7ab6-4397-a9ff-11f0dd4345cf Thu, 16 Jan 2025 09:02:37 -0500 Study identifies potential pathway to improve memory in neurodegenerative diseases
新研究揭示绝经后女性骨关节炎风险背后的机制骨关节炎 (OA) 是一种对绝经后女性影响尤为严重的疾病，数以百万计的受影响者可以证明这种疾病带来的疼痛、活动能力下降和生活质量下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-research-uncovers-mechanisms-behind-osteoarthritis-risk-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-research-uncovers-mechanisms-behind-osteoarthritis-risk-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e9a54d2-4506-4c4f-87bb-5d2df4cd3956 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 08:02:10 -0500 New research uncovers mechanisms behind osteoarthritis risk in postmenopausal women
使用超声波引导微泡对抗癌症的新方法来自生物和物理系的康考迪亚研究人员团队发表的一篇新论文提出了一种利用超声引导微泡对抗癌症肿瘤的新方法，这种技术已经广泛应用于医学成像和药物输送。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Novel-method-to-fight-cancer-uses-ultrasound-guided-microbubbles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Novel-method-to-fight-cancer-uses-ultrasound-guided-microbubbles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80d5a275-dd40-4df4-9916-2332a5e376f0 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 07:51:37 -0500 Novel method to fight cancer uses ultrasound-guided microbubbles
研究揭示了狼疮患者对 COVID-19 疫苗反应较弱的原因埃默里大学研究人员最近的一项研究提供了新的见解，解释了为什么 2021 年开发的用于对抗 COVID-19 的 mRNA 疫苗对自身免疫性疾病患者效果较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Study-uncovers-why-lupus-病人-have-weaker-response-to-COVID-19-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Study-uncovers-why-lupus-病人-have-weaker-response-to-COVID-19-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f21ff3c-771d-44be-b4b5-f4a26e1b6cc0 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 07:35:47 -0500 Study uncovers why lupus patients have weaker response to COVID-19 vaccines
乳腺癌试验中的药物显示出治疗血癌的潜力圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员领导的两项新研究发现了一种可能的方法，使用一种已经在乳腺癌临床试验中的药物来阻止几种形式的血癌的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Drug-in-breast-cancer-trials-shows-pottial-for-treating-blood-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Drug-in-breast-cancer-trials-shows-pottial-for-treating-blood-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0bccd97-ad89-4eb5-8051-db822e3e90b3 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 07:26:39 -0500 Drug in breast cancer trials shows potential for treating blood cancers
美国各地饮用水污染的环境差异根据寂静之泉研究所科学家的一项新分析，近三分之一的美国人在饮用水中接触过不受管制的污染物，这可能会影响他们的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Environmental-disparities-found-in-drinking-water-contamination-across-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Environmental-disparities-found-in-drinking-water-contamination-across-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45340b80-da04-4c71-92f4-9ca97f691943 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 07:08:34 -0500 Environmental disparities found in drinking water contamination across the U.S.
